Author: sewnp
Text: eating more throughout the day at low calorie amounts if fasting is hard for you. You might want to look into OMAD too to just ease yourself into it. It's hard to go from binging to restricting for anyone because your stomach is just USED to having more food. So I find, personally, eating either one big meal a day or multiple small meals a day helps. Take care of yourself! <3

Author: mangulu
Text: Keto diet and intermittent fasting.   Both promote weight loss by suppressing hunger.  Cut out the carbs and eat as much as you want in a smaller timeframe (8hrs per day for example).   Check out their subreddits for more information.
